title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 598-6.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 598-6.1 - General

State Regulations

The following persons must, in response to a release at a
facility, comply with the requirements of this Subpart: (a) the facility owner; (b) the tank system or container
owner; (c) the operator; (d) the carrier, if the carrier is a
discharger; and
(e) any person who
is a discharger. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
598-6.1

Adopted

New

York State Register July 19, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 29, eff. 10/17/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
